text: Biromanticism is a romantic orientation. A biromantic person has romantic attraction to more than one gender. Biromantic people can have any sexual orientation. The term biromantic is useful for asexual people to describe their affection. The term is related to bisexuality. The term was created in on-line communities, such as Asexual Visibility and Education Network. == References == Category:Bisexuality Category:Romantic orientation
title: Biromanticism
